entry.string: Choose the publication type you want to display with top items.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee poobleeceshun type-a yuoo vunt tu deespley veet tup items. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Check this if you want the block to display content from all publication types all the time.
entry.translation: Check thees iff yuoo vunt zee bluck tu deespley cuntent frum ell poobleeceshun types ell zee teeme-a.

entry.string: Check this if you want to include the publication type in the article links.
entry.translation: Check thees iff yuoo vunt tu incloode-a zee poobleeceshun type-a in zee erteecle-a leenks.

entry.string: Choose the category that you want to display with top items.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee cetegury thet yuoo vunt tu deespley veet tup items.

entry.string: Check this if you want to include this the category in the article links.
entry.translation: Check thees iff yuoo vunt tu incloode-a thees zee cetegury in zee erteecle-a leenks.

entry.string: Check this if you want to display all articles in all subcategories of the current or selected category.
entry.translation: Check thees iff yuoo vunt tu deespley ell erteecles in ell soobcetegureees ooff zee coorrent oor selected cetegury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Check this if you want the block to display content from all categories all the time.
entry.translation: Check thees iff yuoo vunt zee bluck tu deespley cuntent frum ell cetegureees ell zee teeme-a.

entry.string: Check this to have the block title dynamically generated from the current content.
entry.translation: Check thees tu hefe-a zee bluck teetle-a dynemeecelly genereted frum zee coorrent cuntent. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Choose the sorting options for the top items.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee surteeng oopshuns fur zee tup items. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Check this box to show the value of the sort that you chose.
entry.translation: Check thees bux tu shoo zee felooe-a ooff zee surt thet yuoo chuse-a.

entry.string: Select this if you wish to show the summary of the individual item.
entry.translation: Select thees iff yuoo veesh tu shoo zee soommery ooff zee indeefidooel item.
